channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-28136|2024-10-15T18:35:10.138Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20jiratestresultreporter%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins JiraTestResultReporter Plugin 165.v817928553942 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-23113|2024-10-15T17:14:13.043Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20publish%20over%20ssh%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Publish Over SSH Plugin 1.22 and earlier performs a validation of the file name specifying whether it is present or not, resulting in a path traversal vulnerability allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to discover the name of the Jenkins controller files.

item.title: CVE-2021-21641|2024-10-15T17:14:47.328Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20promoted%20builds%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins promoted builds Plugin 3.9 and earlier allows attackers to to promote builds.

item.title: CVE-2022-29052|2024-10-15T17:13:31.123Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20google%20compute%20engine%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Google Compute Engine Plugin 4.3.8 and earlier stores private keys unencrypted in cloud agent config.xml files on the Jenkins controller where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-27211|2024-10-15T17:13:37.197Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20kubernetes%20continuous%20deploy%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Kubernetes Continuous Deploy Plugin 2.3.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified SSH server using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-25176|2024-10-15T17:14:05.406Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20groovy%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Groovy Plugin 2648.va9433432b33c and earlier follows symbolic links to locations outside of the checkout directory for the configured SCM when reading the script file (typically Jenkinsfile) for Pipelines, allowing attackers able to configure Pipelines to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-25190|2024-10-15T17:13:57.861Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20conjur%20secrets%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Conjur Secrets Plugin 1.0.11 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2024-47804|2024-10-02T16:31:20.670Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: If an attempt is made to create an item of a type prohibited by `ACL#hasCreatePermission2` or `TopLevelItemDescriptor#isApplicableIn(ItemGroup)` through the Jenkins CLI or the REST API and either of these checks fail, Jenkins 2.478 and earlier, LTS 2.462.2 and earlier creates the item in memory, only deleting it from disk, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to save the item to persist it, effectively bypassing the item creation restriction.

item.title: CVE-2024-47807|2024-10-02T16:38:55.789Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20openid%20connect%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OpenId Connect Authentication Plugin 4.354.v321ce67a_1de8 and earlier does not check the `iss` (Issuer) claim of an ID Token, allowing attackers to subvert the authentication flow, potentially gaining administrator access to Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2024-47805|2024-10-02T16:30:38.170Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Credentials Plugin 1380.va_435002fa_924 and earlier, except 1371.1373.v4eb_fa_b_7161e9, does not redact encrypted values of credentials using the `SecretBytes` type when accessing item `config.xml` via REST API or CLI.

item.title: CVE-2024-47806|2024-10-02T16:37:13.218Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20openid%20connect%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OpenId Connect Authentication Plugin 4.354.v321ce67a_1de8 and earlier does not check the `aud` (Audience) claim of an ID Token, allowing attackers to subvert the authentication flow, potentially gaining administrator access to Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2024-47803|2024-10-02T16:32:17.479Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.478 and earlier, LTS 2.462.2 and earlier does not redact multi-line secret values in error messages generated for form submissions involving the `secretTextarea` form field.

item.title: CVE-2024-43045|2024-08-07T13:27:12.065Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.470 and earlier, LTS 2.452.3 and earlier does not perform a permission check in an HTTP endpoint, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to access other users' "My Views".

item.title: CVE-2024-43044|2024-08-07T13:27:11.438Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.470 and earlier, LTS 2.452.3 and earlier allows agent processes to read arbitrary files from the Jenkins controller file system by using the `ClassLoaderProxy#fetchJar` method in the Remoting library.

item.title: CVE-2024-34147|2024-08-02T02:51:09.825Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20telegram%20bot%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Telegram Bot Plugin 1.4.0 and earlier stores the Telegram Bot token unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2024-34146|2024-08-02T02:42:59.969Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20server%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Git server Plugin 114.v068a_c7cc2574 and earlier does not perform a permission check for read access to a Git repository over SSH, allowing attackers with a previously configured SSH public key but lacking Overall/Read permission to access these repositories.

item.title: CVE-2024-34148|2024-08-02T02:51:09.888Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier programmatically disables the fix for CVE-2016-3721 whenever a build is triggered from a release tag, by setting the Java system property 'hudson.model.ParametersAction.keepUndefinedParameters'.

item.title: CVE-2024-34145|2024-08-02T02:43:00.455Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving sandbox-defined classes that shadow specific non-sandbox-defined classes in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34144|2024-08-02T02:42:59.914Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving crafted constructor bodies in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-5273|2024-08-01T21:11:12.451Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20report%20info%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Report Info Plugin 1.2 and earlier does not perform path validation of the workspace directory while serving report files, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to retrieve Surefire failures, PMD violations, Findbugs bugs, and Checkstyle errors on the controller file system by editing the workspace path.

item.title: CVE-2024-39458|2024-07-05T20:18:50.446Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20structs%20plugin
item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.title: CVE-2024-39460|2024-06-26T19:00:20.037Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 886.v44cf5e4ecec5 and earlier prints the Bitbucket OAuth access token as part of the Bitbucket URL in the build log in some cases.

item.title: CVE-2024-39459|2024-06-26T17:06:27.043Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20plain%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: In rare cases Jenkins Plain Credentials Plugin 182.v468b_97b_9dcb_8 and earlier stores secret file credentials unencrypted (only Base64 encoded) on the Jenkins controller file system, where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system (global credentials) or with Item/Extended Read permission (folder-scoped credentials).

item.title: CVE-2024-39460|2024-06-26T17:06:27.695Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 886.v44cf5e4ecec5 and earlier prints the Bitbucket OAuth access token as part of the Bitbucket URL in the build log in some cases.

item.title: CVE-2024-39458|2024-06-26T17:06:26.399Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20structs%20plugin
item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.title: CVE-2024-34147|2024-06-04T17:41:24.679Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20telegram%20bot%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Telegram Bot Plugin 1.4.0 and earlier stores the Telegram Bot token unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2024-34146|2024-06-04T17:41:47.091Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20server%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Git server Plugin 114.v068a_c7cc2574 and earlier does not perform a permission check for read access to a Git repository over SSH, allowing attackers with a previously configured SSH public key but lacking Overall/Read permission to access these repositories.

item.title: CVE-2024-34145|2024-06-06T18:23:32.356Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving sandbox-defined classes that shadow specific non-sandbox-defined classes in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34148|2024-06-04T17:42:07.420Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier programmatically disables the fix for CVE-2016-3721 whenever a build is triggered from a release tag, by setting the Java system property 'hudson.model.ParametersAction.keepUndefinedParameters'.

item.title: CVE-2024-34144|2024-06-06T18:23:11.386Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving crafted constructor bodies in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-5273|2024-05-24T13:46:09.897Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20report%20info%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Report Info Plugin 1.2 and earlier does not perform path validation of the workspace directory while serving report files, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to retrieve Surefire failures, PMD violations, Findbugs bugs, and Checkstyle errors on the controller file system by editing the workspace path.

item.description: In rare cases Jenkins Plain Credentials Plugin 182.v468b_97b_9dcb_8 and earlier stores secret file credentials unencrypted (only Base64 encoded) on the Jenkins controller file system, where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system (global credentials) or with Item/Extended Read permission (folder-scoped credentials).

item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.description: In rare cases Jenkins Plain Credentials Plugin 182.v468b_97b_9dcb_8 and earlier stores secret file credentials unencrypted (only Base64 encoded) on the Jenkins controller file system, where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system (global credentials) or with Item/Extended Read permission (folder-scoped credentials).

item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 886.v44cf5e4ecec5 and earlier prints the Bitbucket OAuth access token as part of the Bitbucket URL in the build log in some cases.

item.description: Jenkins 2.470 and earlier, LTS 2.452.3 and earlier does not perform a permission check in an HTTP endpoint, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to access other users' "My Views".

item.description: Jenkins 2.478 and earlier, LTS 2.462.2 and earlier does not redact multi-line secret values in error messages generated for form submissions involving the `secretTextarea` form field.
